title: Winter Warmth Drive - Dhaka
description: A campaign to distribute warm clothes and blankets to underprivileged communities in Dhaka.

title: Sylhet Winter Relief
description: Providing essential winter clothing to those in need in the Sylhet region.

title: Chattogram Blanket Distribution
description: Ensuring warmth for the homeless by distributing blankets in Chattogram.

title: Rajshahi Winter Care
description: Helping families in Rajshahi face the cold winter with warm clothing.

description: Distributing sweaters and scarves to underprivileged children in Barishal.

title: Khulna Warmth Campaign
description: Supporting the Khulna region with donations of winter essentials.

title: Mymensingh Winter Support
description: Reaching out to rural areas in Mymensingh with much-needed winter supplies.

title: Rangpur Winter Aid
description: Bringing relief to impoverished communities in Rangpur during winter.
